Let $n$ be a natural number. Prove that \[ \left\lfloor \frac{n+2^0}{2^1} \right\rfloor + \left\lfloor \frac{n+2^1}{2^2} \right\rfloor +\cdots +\left\lfloor \frac{n+2^{n-1}}{2^n}\right\rfloor =n. \]\\ Remark
For any real number $x$, the number $\lfloor x \rfloor$ represents the largest integer smaller or equal with $x$.\end{center}
